summary: This document is a summary of account balances for Jeffrey Epstein at Deutsche Bank for the period of February 1, 2019, to February 28, 2019. It details the beginning and ending balances, deposits, checks paid, and service charges associated with the account.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the account holder for the financial records detailed in this document.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The document summarizes account balances for Jeffrey Epstein at Deutsche Bank for February 2019.
The beginning balance on February 1, 2019, was $556,364.42.
A check paid on February 5, 2019, amounted to $5,388.00.
The ending balance as of February 28, 2019, was $562,976.42.
Stewart Oldfield is listed as a contact for inquiries regarding the account.
